title: Baseball Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Heeeeeeeey! Chikaaaa-! Chikaaaaaaaa–!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Fwaaah.... Mia-chan....? What are you doing here this early~? It’s summer break, so let me sleep more~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What are you saying on a day like this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>A day like this? Is there something special today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Chika.... You live in Japan and you don’t know....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Don’t know what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>That today is baseball day! OMG! How is that even possible!? If you really don’t know you better remember it from now on! Come on, we’re gonna watch some baseball!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I can’t believe you’re this excited, Mia-chan.... What an amazing day! I-, I’ll get ready right away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Come on, we’re watching it straight after practice! Hurry up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hieeeeh, give me a minute~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
